ygData.subject: Re: Ore
ygData.msgSnippet: But do they sell molds in HH? ... From: Nick Emmerich  To:  Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 12:33 PM Subject: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
But do they sell molds in HH?

----- Original Message -----
From: Nick Emmerich <seorin@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 12:33 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Ore


>From: Nick Emmerich <seorin@...>
>
>the closest place to Halas with ore is HighKeep. There's a guy in the
>basement. In case you don't know, HighKeep is the castle in Highpass
>Hold. Good luck :)
>-Rennin of E'Ci
> Trade Council GM
>
>Apple wrote:
>
>> you can buy ore in freeport the dark elf city (if you can get in) or
>> in the steamfonts (the gnome newbie area) these are the only places I
>> have found so far
>>
>> ----- Original Message -----
>> From: Bill Hahn
>> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
>> Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 10:48 PM
>> Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Ore
>> Where can I find ore to make metal bits. I am currently in
>> Halas and
>> need to find a close place.
>>
>> Lwen
>> Half-Elf Bard
>> Terrew Marr
>>
